mapper.sql: scid, detail_id, resuest_id, vendor_id, CHILDREN1_TASK, CHILDREN1_LAST_BUILDTIME, CHILDREN1_TYPE, CHILDREN1_REASON, CHILDREN1_AREA, CHILDREN1_LINEAR, CHILDREN1_BUILDTIME, CHILDREN1_VENDOR, CHILDREN1_INNER, CHILDREN1_OUTER, CHILDREN1_AMOUNT, create_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from pcms_showcase
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into pcms_showcase (scid, detail_id, resuest_id, vendor_id, CHILDREN1_TASK, CHILDREN1_LAST_BUILDTIME, CHILDREN1_TYPE, CHILDREN1_REASON, CHILDREN1_AREA, CHILDREN1_LINEAR, CHILDREN1_BUILDTIME, CHILDREN1_VENDOR, CHILDREN1_INNER, CHILDREN1_OUTER, CHILDREN1_AMOUNT, create_time) values (#{scid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{detailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resuestId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vendorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{children1Task,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{children1LastBuildtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{children1Type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{children1Reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{children1Area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{children1Linear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{children1Buildtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{children1Vendor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{children1Inner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{children1Outer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{children1Amount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

detail_id = #{record.detailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update pcms_showcase
detail_id = #{detailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
resuest_id = #{resuestId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vendor_id = #{vendorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHILDREN1_TASK = #{children1Task,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHILDREN1_LAST_BUILDTIME = #{children1LastBuildtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHILDREN1_TYPE = #{children1Type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHILDREN1_REASON = #{children1Reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHILDREN1_AREA = #{children1Area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHILDREN1_LINEAR = #{children1Linear,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHILDREN1_BUILDTIME = #{children1Buildtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHILDREN1_VENDOR = #{children1Vendor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHILDREN1_INNER = #{children1Inner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHILDREN1_OUTER = #{children1Outer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHILDREN1_AMOUNT = #{children1Amount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where scid = #{scid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update pcms_showcase set detail_id = #{detailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, resuest_id = #{resuestId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vendor_id = #{vendorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHILDREN1_TASK = #{children1Task,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHILDREN1_LAST_BUILDTIME = #{children1LastBuildtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHILDREN1_TYPE = #{children1Type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHILDREN1_REASON = #{children1Reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHILDREN1_AREA = #{children1Area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHILDREN1_LINEAR = #{children1Linear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHILDREN1_BUILDTIME = #{children1Buildtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHILDREN1_VENDOR = #{children1Vendor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHILDREN1_INNER = #{children1Inner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHILDREN1_OUTER = #{children1Outer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHILDREN1_AMOUNT = #{children1Amount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where scid = #{scid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT b.scid, c.vendor_name AS vendorName, b.CHILDREN1_TYPE , b.CHILDREN1_LAST_BUILDTIME, b.CHILDREN1_REASON, b.CHILDREN1_AREA, b.CHILDREN1_LINEAR, b.CHILDREN1_BUILDTIME, b.CHILDREN1_INNER, b.CHILDREN1_OUTER FROM pcms_item a LEFT JOIN pcms_showcase b ON a.detail_id = b.detail_id LEFT JOIN pcms_supplier c ON c.vendor_id=a.vendor_id WHERE a.itid = #{itid}
